channel.title: Harmony Spawn Pk/ Eco Release!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello everyone, I'm here to release the server I've been working on for the last few weeks. It's a Spawn server for all the people who want to PK (Which I have a feeling it'll mostly be about pking anyways), but nonetheless; there's Bosses, most skills, quests (with working quest cape), ect. Also, before people say anything, I used the 'Rune-Legacy' source as a base, just so everyone knows.
Forums: [url=http://harmony.elementfx.com/forums/index.php]Harmony - Index[/url]
Cache Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2ya7mo2xwk25czs].falador_v2.rar[/url]
Client Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?lbsd5kvax0fj0hz]Harmony.jar[/url]
To play, you must extract the cache to you User Account on your computer. If you need help in doing so, please check this link:
[U][url=http://harmony.elementfx.com/forums/index.php?topic=9.msg12#new]How to Play Harmony[/url][/U]
[B]Server Content[/B]
Bridding & [U]PERFECT SWITCHING[/U] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/s6n9ti.jpg[/img]
[B]Many bosses, some of which are: GodWars[/B]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/344309f.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2cd7og5.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1zoj8ky.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/28smvxx.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER]Kalphite Queen[/CENTER]
[B][CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15zrzb9.jpg[/img][/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER][I]And many more![/I]
[B]PKP Shop[/B]
[B][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/5lb19y.jpg[/img][/B]
[B]Unique Skilling points and Skilling Shop![/B]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vvvwq0.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[I][CENTER]And much, much more![/CENTER]
[CENTER][B]Player Commands
I went to the liberty of adding commands that a normal player can use because yes, it is a Spawn server, so pking should be enjoyable.
[I]::commands[/I] [I]:: players[/I] [I]::master[/I] [I]:: pure[/I] [I]:: purepk[/I] [I]::melee[/I] [I]::brid[/I] [I]::veng[/I] [I]::barrage[/I] [I]:: pots[/I] [I]::food[/I]
[I]And many more![/I]
Since the server is just starting out, there will obviously be a lower player count than on many servers, but everyone has to start somewhere! Hope to see you guys, if you have any questions, message me on the forums, pm on here, or my Skype: drwafflesyo[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Credits[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Credits to Gensis and all the people who helped make Rune-Legacy, as it's the source I'm using.
Also thanks to Resolute for helping me with a few things, much appreciated man. :)[/CENTER]

item.title: Harmony Spawn Pk/ Eco Release!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You should

-get a working cachedownloader

and on a personal level R-L source just isn’t R-L without a proper skilling system. Making it pvp will just make it bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Harmony Spawn Pk/ Eco Release!
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Waffles Dr Waffles
item.description:
@Dr_Waffles wrote:

[CENTER]Hello everyone, I’m here to release the server I’ve been working on for the last few weeks. It’s a Spawn server for all the people who want to PK (Which I have a feeling it’ll mostly be about pking anyways), but nonetheless; there’s Bosses, most skills, quests (with working quest cape), ect. Also, before people say anything, I used the ‘Rune-Legacy’ source as a base, just so everyone knows.

Forums: Harmony - Index

Cache Link: .falador_v2.rar

Client Link: Harmony.jar

To play, you must extract the cache to you User Account on your computer. If you need help in doing so, please check this link:

How to Play Harmony

Server Content

Many bosses, some of which are: GodWars

[I][CENTER]And much, much more![/CENTER]

[CENTER][B]Player Commands

I went to the liberty of adding commands that a normal player can use because yes, it is a Spawn server, so pking should be enjoyable.

I:: players[/I]
I::master[/I]
I:: pure[/I]
I:: purepk[/I]
I::melee[/I]
I::brid[/I]

I:: pots[/I]
I::food[/I]

IAnd many more![/I]

Since the server is just starting out, there will obviously be a lower player count than on many servers, but everyone has to start somewhere! Hope to see you guys, if you have any questions, message me on the forums, pm on here, or my Skype: drwafflesyo[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Credits[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Credits to Gensis and all the people who helped make Rune-Legacy, as it’s the source I’m using.

Also thanks to Resolute for helping me with a few things, much appreciated man. :)[/CENTER]
